price: 29. It was but one Saihah (shout) and lo! they (all) were still (silent,dead,destroyed).
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūna
